casebody.data:
In the Matter of SPIVEY. No. 289P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2007.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of June 2007 by Petitioner (Michele Spivey) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2007."
